text: NGC 84 (PGC 3325897) is a star in the constellation of Andromeda. Usually mistaken with PGC 1384, it was recorded on November 14, 1884 by Guillaume Bigourdan. NGC 84 is displayed as PGC 1384 in Wikisky. == References == == External links == * 0084 18841114 Category:Discoveries by Guillaume Bigourdan Category:Andromeda (constellation)
title: NGC 84
